translations: n．酒，酒精饮料：含有酒精的饮料，通常用于非正式场合。
· He bought a lot of boozes for the party.
v．痛饮，大喝：大量饮用酒精饮料，通常用于非正式场合。

sentences.sentence: Maybe he boozes on the side.
The troubled pop star has reportedly accused Kevin Federline of smoking pot around the couple's sons - to counter claims she boozes in front of the kids.
sentences.translation: 据传这位陷入麻烦的明星控告凯文·费德林在他们孩子面前吸大麻，依次来反诉她在孩子面前醉酒的行为。
